tr_errorActionText: An error occurred. Try to refresh the page. If this won’t help, try to fully restart Organized. Note, that this will clear all your unsynced data.
tr_updateDescription: Available na ang bagong bersyon ng Organized
tr_appAboutDesc:
Organized is designed for use by Jehovah’s Witnesses congregations. Its goal is to simplify and speed up all congregation planning tasks and improve assignment tracking for everyone.

Plan midweek and weekend meetings effortlessly, send reports, and view your assigned parts with just a few clicks. This app is designed for anyone in the congregation to use and benefit from.

We’re actively enhancing Organized to release even more features in the future. You can help us bring these exciting features sooner! You can support us through voluntary donations or by assisting in developing next versions of Organized.
tr_wantSupportApp: Gusto mo bang suportahan ang Organized?
tr_supportAppDesc: Organized is a free app, and we’re happy to develop and share it with you. While we work on it with enthusiasm, maintaining it costs money. If you’d like to show your appreciation, your support would be greatly appreciated!
tr_supportAppOption1Desc: Ang iyong mga donasyon ay makakatulong para manatiling libre ang Organized para sa mga kongregasyon. Pinagtatakpan nito ang gastos ng server at tumutulong sa amin na mas mabilis na magbuo ng mga bagong feature. Ang iyong kabaitan ay sumusuporta sa mga kongregasyon sa buong mundo!
tr_supportAppOption2Desc:
We’d appreciate your help in the following areas:

  • React development
  • UI/UX Design
  • App translation

If you can help in any of these areas, please contact us. Let’s work together to improve Organized!

Also, recommending Organized to others extends its reach and benefits congregations. Any way you contribute truly enhances the app, making it better for everyone.
tr_internalError: May naganap na internal na error sa amin. Subukan muli mamaya.
tr_themeFollowOSDisable: I-off ang awtomatikong pagpapalit ng theme?
tr_themeFollowOSDisableDesc: Maaaring tignan sa setting ng profile upang mabago ang theme
tr_2FATokenInvalidExpired: Mali o na-expire na ang code. Subukan muli.
tr_unsupportedBrowserErrorDesc: Hindi suportadong browser ang gamit mo para sa Organized app. Siguraduhing ang iyong browser ay updated, o subukan gumamit ng ibang browser.
tr_featureComingSoon: Paparating pa lang ang feature na ito
tr_featureComingSoonDesc: Hindi pa available ang feature na ito. Pinagsisikapan pa namin ito. Manatiling updated!
